title: New PS5 console covers and controllers are coming in Techno Red, Remix Green, and Rhythm Blue. #ps5

author: IGN
description:
We are at CES 2026 in Las Vegas and got our hands on some of the best gaming peripherals at the show. We played with the MCON, MCON Slim, Genki Grips for the Nintendo Switch 2, 8BitDo FlipPad, 8BitDo Ultimate 3E Controller for Xbox, and GAMR Dance Pad. For all of the best gaming tech coming out of CES 2026 in Las Vegas, keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Top 5 Gaming Peripherals - CES 2026

author: IGN
description: Check out the Reveal Trailer for Senara: The Sacrament, a first-person survival horror game developed by Influsion Inc. Players will find themselves aboard a ship as part of a religious organization filled with inexplicable horrors around every corner. Solve puzzles, manage resources, and survive the unholy terrors through faith in hopes of salvation on the other side of the nightmare. Senara: The Sacrament is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Senara: The Sacrament - Official Reveal Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
We got hands-on with the new ASUS ROG XREAL R1 AR glasses at CES 2026. We tested a number of games using the Rog Xbox Ally X plugged into the dock to experience 120hz gaming using the glasses. These will work with the Nintendo Switch 2, Steam Deck, Steam Deck OLED and a number of other entertainment and gaming consoles. For all of the best CES reveals and all things gaming, keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #Gaming
title: ASUS ROG XREAL R1 Preview - CES 2026

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Fallout Collaboration Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone, the latest installments to the first-person shooter franchise. Players can leave their Vaults and head to the battlefield with Fallout-inspired content coming to the game. New limited-time modes are also on the way, with Ghoul Infection coming to Multiplayer, a new Fallout-inspired Vault Town map variant, Power Armor Royale Mode for Warzone, and so much more. Fallout Content hits Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone on January 8.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty x Fallout - Official Collaboration Trailer

title: 5-person Fortnite squads are called "Quints" and that mode will be available until 2/5! #fortnite

author: IGN
description:
Check out the South Park 'Born in Chaos' Collaboration Trailer for Fortnite, the hit action battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players can now finally embody Cartman, Kenny, Stan, Kyle, and Butters with their arrival in the Item Shop, alongside attaining free items through progression of the Born in Chaos Pass. Explore Cartmanland and jump into the new Quints 5-person playlist with the South Park Collaboration for Fortnite, launching on February 5.

#IGN #Gaming #Fortnite
title: Fortnite x South Park: Born in Chaos - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'For Demacia' Season 1 Cinematic Trailer for League of Legends, the legendary MOBA developed by Riot Games. Players can get a new look at the upcoming season for 2026, calling upon players to take a stand and fight the good fight in spite of the darkest of hours. Season 1 for League of Legends launches on January 8 for PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: League of Legends - Official 'For Demacia' Season 1 Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the RTX: Inside The Game Building a Cinematic Wuxia Action Experience for Phantom Blade Zero, an upcoming third-person action dark fantasy Wuxia RPG developed by S-Game. Players can get the rundown from the CEO of S-Game Soulframe Liang on how Phantom Blade Zero incorporates NVIDIA DLSS 4 and Ray Tracing to bring their signature Kung Fu Punk visual design to life. Phantom Blade Zero is launching on September 9 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

Source: https://youtube.com/nvidia

#PhantomBladeZero #Gaming #IGN
title: Phantom Blade Zero - Official RTX: Inside The Game Building a Cinematic Wuxia Action Experience

author: IGN
description:
If you love Warhammer 40K cinematic trailers as much as we do, you're in for a treat with this new one for Dawn of War 4, the upcoming real-time strategy game from King Art Games due out for PC this year, showing off the Ork Faction. Wishlist Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2272360/Warhammer_40000_Dawn_of_War_IV/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 – Official Ork Faction Trailer | IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Hyperpop Collection Trailer for the PlayStation 5 and DualSense controller, the latest gaming console and controller developed by Sony. Players can take a look at an upcoming line of colorways for the PS5 and DualSense with a striking gradient of Techno Red, Remix Green, and Rhythm Blue, offering a more vibrant and eye-catching look to your gaming hardware. The Hyperpop Collection launches on March 12 with pre-orders starting on January 16 at 10 AM local time on PlayStation Direct.

#PS5 #HyperpopCollection #Gaming
title: PlayStation 5 - Official Hyperpop Collection Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Akira Yamaoka Collaboration Trailer for Pathologic 3, a psychological first-person survival horror game developed by Ice-Pick Lodge. Players can get an abstract and vibrant look at the next installment in the franchise through a new trailer coupled with the soundtrack straight from the mind of the legendary Japanese composer Akira Yamaoka. Pathologic 3 is launching on January 9 for PC (Steam).
title: Pathologic 3 x Akira Yamaoka - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the gameplay trailer for Silver Palace, an upcoming anime action fantasy RPG developed by Silver Studio. Players can get an extensive look at the open world, narrative cutscenes, and combat from the upcoming title that brings players to the heart of the Victorian-inspired metropolis of Silvernia. Engage in detective work, master combo attacks, and explore the vibrant city in Silver Palace, coming soon to PC with an eventual release on consoles, iOS, and Android.
title: Silver Palace - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Someone Who Can Charm A Room' Clip for Send Help, a darkly comedic psychological thriller distributed by 20th Century Studios starring Rachel McAdams, Dylan O'Brien, Edyll Ismail, and more. The latest clip depicts a demeaning conversation between a boss and an employee on how the employee lacks charisma and charm to get an executive promotion. Send Help is in theaters on January 30 with tickets available now.

Linda Liddle and Bradley Preston, two colleagues who find themselves stranded on a deserted island after they are the only survivors of a plane crash. On the island, they must overcome past grievances and work together to survive, but ultimately, it becomes an unsettling and darkly humorous battle of wills and wits to make it out alive. 

Send Help stars Rachel McAdams, Dylan O'Brien, Edyll Ismail, Dennis Haysbert, Xavier Samuel, Chris Pang, Thaneth Warakulnukroh, Emma Raimi, and more. The film is directed by Sam Raimi, alongside being executive produced by J
title: Send Help - Official 'Someone Who Can Charm A Room' Clip (2026)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for The Testament of Ann Lee, a biographical historical drama musical distributed by Annapurna Pictures. Explore the Shaker Movement through song and dance in The Testament of Ann Lee, now playing in select theaters with a full theatrical release on January 23.

From award-winning writer-director Mona Fastvold (The World to Come, The Brutalist) comes the extraordinary true legend of Ann Lee, founder of the devotional sect known as the Shakers. Academy Award nominee Amanda Seyfried stars as the Shaker's irrepressible leader, who preached gender and social equality and was revered by her followers. The Testament of Ann Lee captures the ecstasy and agony of her quest to build a utopia, featuring more than a dozen traditional Shaker hymns reimagined as rapturous movements with choreography by Celia Rowlson-Hall (Vox Lux) and original songs & score by Academy Award winner Daniel Blumberg (The Brutalist).

The Testament of Ann Lee stars Amanda Seyfried, Thoma
title: The Testament of Ann Lee - Official Trailer (2026) Amanda Seyfried, Thomasin Mckenzie, Lewis Pullman

author: IGN
description:
After several hours playing through an exclusive, hands-on demo of Cairn, the upcoming climbing-survival sim, we were riveted. Our time on the mountain was filled with arduous climbs punctuated with periods of quiet reflection, life-or-death battles against the elements, and a combined sense of victory and wonder as we reached higher and higher. Previewed by Justin Koreis

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cairn Pits You Against the Mountain in a Climbing Puzzler with Deadly Consequences

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Demo Trailer for Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined, a remake of the iconic classic RPG developed by Square Enix. Players can now access a demo to get a taste of what the full game has to offer upon release. 

The demo also allows for the progress to be carried over to the full game, and players who have saved data from the demo on their console will receive Maribel's "Day Off Dress" reward to use in-game. The Demo for Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam), with the full game launcing on February 5.

#IGN #DragonQuest7Reimagined #DragonQuest
title: Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Demo Trailer for Nocturnal 2, a 2D Metroidvania hack-and-slash action RPG developed by Sunnyside Games. Players will explore an abstract city with echoes of Persian architecture to seek new routes, acquire new abilities, and dispatch enemies along the way to break the hold of a curse upon the homeland. Nocturnal 2 is coming soon to Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam), with a demo launching on January 27 for Steam.
title: Nocturnal 2 - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 featuring NVIDIA's DLSS 4.5! Deep learning super sampling aka DLSS 4.5 is the latest technology from NVIDIA featuring better lighting, Linear Space Rendering, crisper visual fidelity, and improved frame rates for all RTX GPUs. 

Gameplay Captured with an RTX 5090
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 | DLSS 4.5 Gameplay

Gameplay Captured with an RTX 5090

title: Hogwarts Legacy | DLSS 4.5 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
NVIDIA kicked off CES 2026 with a breakdown of their new DLSS 4 games as well as the new DLSS 4.5. We have gameplay from Resident Evil Requiem, 007 First Light, Phantom Blade Zero, Active Matter, Pragmata and Battlefield 6 all using DLSS 4. For all things NVIDIA, biggest announcements at CES, RE9 and 4K Path Tracing, keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #Gaming
title: All New DLSS 4 Gameplay - CES 2026

author: IGN
description: Watch the Demo Release Date Trailer for Super Alloy Crush, a fast-paced 2D action roguelike side-scrolling brawler developed by Alloy Mushroom. Players will embody one of the Cosmic Hunters, Kelly and Muu, on an action-packed quest ot defeat enemies, chain combos, and seek the elusive treasure of Planet AE-38. Super Alloy Crush is coming soon to PC (Steam), with a demo launching on January 22 for Steam.
title: Super Alloy Crush - Official Demo Release Date Trailer
